messages.subject: Re: Vaccination was: kids need to hear NO from parents! now teeth
messages.msgSnippet: My two boys have never seen a shot in their lives (thus far.) Our first had to be delivered in the hospital.  We never let them do anything to him.  No
messages.messageBody:
My two boys have never seen a shot in their lives (thus far.)

Our first had to be delivered in the hospital. We never let them do anything to him. No anything.

Our second was born at home in water! They were both great experiences.

Most of the vaccinations are for natural childhood diseases. Diseases that, if they 'catch' them, will give them life-long immunity, unlike vaccinations.

I can count on one hand the number of times each of them have been sick.

An interesting site I found many years back http://www.909shot.com/ - The National Vaccination Information Center

Shannon

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
